item.title: By: Declan Lynch
item.dc:creator: Declan Lynch
item.description: <p>There are a few of us going to meet in the Irish Pub in downtown Disney after the Cirque show. No idea how you might recognise us. Just look for the drunken Irish guy complaining that they can't pour guinness properly over here <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>></p>
item.content:encoded: There are a few of us going to meet in the Irish Pub in downtown Disney after the Cirque show. No idea how you might recognise us. Just look for the drunken Irish guy complaining that they can’t pour guinness properly over here http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“>
